lead_paragraph: The Judiciary Committee chairman, Senator Charles E. Grassley, has invited Judge Merrick B. Garland to breakfast to explain why Republicans will not hold hearings on his Supreme Court nomination.

headline.print_headline: An Invitation to a Nominee, but Simply to Explain
headline.main: Meeting Merrick Garland to Tell Him Why G.O.P. Won’t Hold Hearings

snippet: The Judiciary Committee chairman, Senator Charles E. Grassley, has invited Judge Merrick B. Garland to breakfast to explain why Republicans will not hold hearings on his Supreme Court nomination.
abstract: Sen Charles E Grassley, chairman of Judiciary Committee, says he has invited Pres Obama's Supreme Court nominee Judge Merrick B Garland to breakfast to explain in person why Republicans will not hold hearings on his appointment.
